1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import os
4 import rospy
5 import rospkg
6 import tf
7 from gazebo_msgs.srv import SpawnModel, SpawnModelRequest, \
8  SetModelState, SetLinkState
9 from gazebo_msgs.msg import ModelState, LinkState, Quaternion, Point, Pose
10 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
11 
12 
13 class IMUBoxStateManager():
14  def __init__(self, model_names, init_poses=None, sdf=True):
15  """
16  Spawns the IMU model.
17 
18  Arguments
19  ---------
20  `model_names`: `List[str]`
21  The model names for the IMU
22 
23  `init_poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
24  `[Pose(Position xyz, Orientation quaternion)]`
25 
26  `sdf`: `bool`
27  launch from sdf or urdf
28  """
29  self.model_names = model_names
30  self.n = len(model_names)
31  self.sdf = sdf
32  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
33  self.imu_q = Quaternion()
34  self.position = Point(1, 1, 1)
35  init_poses = [Pose(position=self.position, orientation=self.imu_q)]
36  # rospy.Subscriber('imu0_pose', Quaternion, self.imu_callback)
37  rospy.Subscriber('imu/data', Imu, self.imu_callback)
38 
39  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
40  if sdf:
41  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
42  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy(
43  '/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model', SpawnModel)
44  model_path = os.path.join(
45  ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imubox/model.sdf')
46  self.set_model_state = rospy.ServiceProxy(
47  '/gazebo/set_model_state', SetModelState)
48  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
49  xml_string = f.read().replace('\n', '')
50  else:
51  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model')
52  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy(
53  '/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model', SpawnModel)
54  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imu.urdf')
55  self.set_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy(
56  '/gazebo/set_link_state', SetLinkState)
57  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
58  xml_string = f.read()
59 
60  if init_poses is None:
61  q = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, 0)
62  orientation = Quaternion(q[0], q[1], q[2], q[3])
63  position = Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
64  init_pose = Pose(position=position, orientation=orientation)
65  init_poses = [init_pose for i in range(self.n)]
66 
67  self.init_poses = init_poses
68  self.req = SpawnModelRequest()
69  self.req.model_xml = xml_string
70 
71  def imu_callback(self, data):
72  # self.imu_q = data
73  self.imu_q = data.orientation
74 
75  def spawn(self):
76  """
77  Spawns the IMU model with the poses defined earlier in
78  `__init__`
79  """
80  for model_name, pose in zip(self.model_names, self.init_poses):
81  try:
82  self.req.model_name = model_name
83  self.req.initial_pose = pose
84  res = self.spawn_model(self.req)
85  print(res)
86  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
87  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
88 
89  def set_poses(self, names, poses):
90  """
91  Sets the poses of the IMU.
92 
93  Arguments
94  ---------
95  `names`: `List[str]`
96  The names of the IMUs
97 
98  `poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
99  The poses of the IMUs
100  """
101  for name, pose in zip(names, poses):
102  self.set_pose(name, pose)
103 
104  def set_pose(self, name, pose=None):
105  """
106  Sets a pose of an IMU
107 
108  Arguments
109  ---------
110  `name`: `str`
111  The name of the IMU
112 
113  `poses`: `geometry_msgs.msg.Pose`
114  The pose of the IMU
115  """
116  pose = Pose(position=self.position, orientation=self.imu_q)
117 
118  if self.sdf:
119  try:
120  state_msg = ModelState()
121  state_msg.model_name = name
122  state_msg.pose = pose
123  state_msg.reference_frame = "world"
124  res = self.set_model_state(state_msg)
125  print(res)
126  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
127  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
128  else:
129  try:
130  link_msg = LinkState()
131  link_msg.link_name = name
132  link_msg.pose = pose
133  link_msg.reference_frame = "world"
134  res = self.set_link_state(state_msg)
135  print(res)
136  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
137  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
138 
139 
140 if __name__ == '__main__':
141  rospy.init_node("set_estimated_imu_positions_data")
142 
143  model_names = ['imu6']
144  state_manager = IMUBoxStateManager(model_names)
145  state_manager.spawn()
146 
147  r = rospy.Rate(30)
148 
149  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
150  state_manager.set_pose(model_names[0])
151  r.sleep()
